div.head: Location
div.p: Foreign Policy Archives of the Russian Federation (AVP RF): Plotnikov pereulok 11, Moscow.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write to the Department of History and Records, Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, Moscow, Russia to request permission to begin research in the archives. A passport is needed upon arrival.
